title: Ranil solves disputes among UNP-UK factions
content: Onlanka News – By Thushara Amarasinghe from London (Pix by: Upendra Alwis- SLUK Media) UNP leader Ranil Wickremasinghe requested UNP party members in the UK to join hands together to bring the party into the winning stream. He made these remarks when Mr Wickremasinghe met the interim committee and the members of the UNP-UK branch…
